title: Website Ranks etc.
body: How does one go about receiving ranks on the website, specifically forums? I see people all day with "Junior" or "Senior" Member statuses. Is there a certain way to go about receiving each of these? How does that work?

replies.body:
Hey **Tsar of Equinox**,

The ranks on the Boards are related to the amount of posts a user has made. I believe that Senior members have made 100 or more posts.
Awesome. I appreciate the quick feedback.
